thread.title: THE DEBATE - Europe s Migrant Crisis: Share the burden or shut the borders? (part 1) -
thread.title_full: THE DEBATE - Europe s Migrant Crisis: Share the burden or shut the borders? (part 1) - France 24

author: François PICARD
title: THE DEBATE - Europe s Migrant Crisis: Share the burden or shut the borders? (part 1) -
text:
The French prime minister visited a migrant shelter in Calais Monday. It’s perceived as a major flashpoint, despite drawing a mere fraction of the 300,000 who so far this year have reached Europe's shores. Security there has been tightened, and now the British Home Secretary wants to go a step further, barring even EU citizens who don't have a firm job offer. Is an emergency meeting in two weeks of Europe's interior ministers doomed to failure before it even starts? Produced by Charles Wente, Van Meguerditchian and Emerald Maxwell
By François PICARD
Our guests Maya KONFORTI Volunteer, L'Auberge des Migrants
Yves BERTONCINI Director, Jacques Delors Institute
Nic CONNER Home Affair Research Fellow, The Bow Group
Carolina SANCHEZ BOE Lecturer, Sorbonne University, Paris V
Follow us
